Work Experience

  • Quantitative Researcher | Educator

    Feb 2023 - Sep 2023

    QuantEdX

    Developed and implemented advanced Machine Learning-based LFT/MFT models for enhanced trading strategies, effectively leveraging statistical arbitrage and derivative pricing techniques. Conducted in-depth credit risk analysis and led research in innovative quantitative models for derivative pricing.

    Machine Learning Derivative Pricing Risk Management Statistical Arbitrage

  • Section Engineer

    Jun 2016 - Aug 2022

    Jal Shakti Dept. PHE, Jammu & Kashmir, India

    Managed and maintained electro-mechanical systems for water pumping stations, including procurement and maintenance of motors, actuators, and PLC logic systems. Engineered and debugged control logic for power machinery using microcontrollers (Arduino, Raspberry Pi, STM32) and chips (Intel 8051, PIC, ARM Cortex-M series) to automate operations.

    PLC Systems Microcontrollers Control Logic Electro-mechanical

  • Assistant Manager

    Jul 2013 - Jul 2015

    Maruti Suzuki India Limited

    Experienced in automotive HVAC system design, development, and optimization with focus on electro-fluidic parts and control systems. Designed, tested, and evaluated HVAC systems using electronic control units (ECUs) with microprocessors (Intel 8086, Motorola 68000 series) and sensors (temperature, pressure, flow sensors). Performed heat load calculations and thermal management analysis.

    HVAC Systems ECU Design Thermal Analysis Sensor Integration
